channel.title: Comments on: Proof
channel.description: Deliver the package. Change your life.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: The idea is that when the ledger is full, the last person can mail in their copy in exchange for a new one. I can then update the map by using the ledger. Packages generate tracking numbers, part of which is a ZIP code. I can use the ZIP code on the map.
item.content:encoded: The idea is that when the ledger is full, the last person can mail in their copy in exchange for a new one. I can then update the map by using the ledger. Packages generate tracking numbers, part of which is a ZIP code. I can use the ZIP code on the map.

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: Nevermind I see it. Well I hope there is a note or a link or something in the book. I'll definitely remind people to update it but I can't vouch for when the book leaves my circle.
item.content:encoded: Nevermind I see it. Well I hope there is a note or a link or something in the book. I’ll definitely remind people to update it but I can’t vouch for when the book leaves my circle.

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: Will there be a way for future owners of the book to update the map?
item.content:encoded: Will there be a way for future owners of the book to update the map?
